remarks.para: May be inoperative provided visual confirmation of proper aileron movement is made before each departure.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "AILERON POS IND INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Perform visual check of surface movement:
Establish communications – flight deck to ground.

warning.para: ENSURE THAT PERSONNEL AND EQUIPMENT ARE CLEAR OF ALL FLIGHT CONTROL SURFACES.

entry.para: Observe left ailerons up, right ailerons down.
Observe right ailerons up, left ailerons down.

note.para: Inboard aileron deflection will be approximately 20º up or down. Outboard aileron deflection will be approximately 25° up and 15° down.

numlitem.para: Restore aircraft to its required configuration.
